title: Deconovo Window Treatment Panels Thermal Insulated Blackout Rod Light Blocking Pocket Curtains with Printed Circle Pattern for Sliding Glass Door, 42x95, Turquoise
features: Two Panels Per Package, each measuring 42W x 95L Inches, set measuring 84W x 95L Inches.
Deconovo rod pocket blackout curtains are also thermal insulated and prevent from heat escapes and blocks sunlight from entering the room.
They are silky, soft, drapery and very pleasant to touch and gives an expensive look to any room.
These thermal insulated blackout curtains are made of 100% polyester, imported.
